name: advisor_diagnose
cmd:
set -o pipefail
echo "=== System Advisor Diagnose ==="
echo "Timestamp: $(date -Is)"
echo
echo "## Host"
hostnamectl 2>/dev/null || true
echo
echo "## OS"
cat /etc/os-release 2>/dev/null || true
echo
echo "## Kernel / Uptime"
uname -a
uptime -p
echo
echo "## CPU"
lscpu 2>/dev/null | sed -n '1,25p' || true
echo
echo "## Memory"
free -h || true
echo
echo "## Disks"
lsblk -o NAME,FSTYPE,SIZE,TYPE,MOUNTPOINT 2>/dev/null | sed -n '1,80p' || true
echo
echo "## Filesystem usage"
df -hT | sed -n '1,80p' || true
echo
echo "## Top processes (by CPU)"
ps -eo pid,ppid,cmd,%mem,%cpu --sort=-%cpu | head -n 15 || true
echo
echo "## GPUs"
( command -v nvidia-smi >/dev/null 2>&1 && nvidia-smi -L ) || ( lspci | grep -Ei 'vga|3d|2d' ) || true
echo
echo "## Python"
( python3 --version 2>/dev/null; pip --version 2>/dev/null ) || true
echo
echo "## Node"
( node --version 2>/dev/null; npm --version 2>/dev/null ) || true
echo
echo "## Containers"
( docker info 2>/dev/null | sed -n '1,30p' ) || echo 'docker not available'
( podman info 2>/dev/null | sed -n '1,30p' ) || echo 'podman not available'
echo
echo "## DNF updates (may take a bit)"
( dnf -q check-update || true )
echo
echo "## Services failed"
systemctl --failed --no-legend 2>/dev/null || true
echo
echo "## Network"
ip -br address 2>/dev/null || true
( ping -c 1 -W 2 1.1.1.1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'Outbound: OK' ) || echo 'Outbound: FAIL'
